name: PARADOX (itch) (optisydeYT)
description:
A letter shows up at your house, reminding you of an event from years back. you owe a very dangerous man a lot of money. now, repay via doing his bidding. 

HORRIFYING SCENARIOS 

A top down horror shooter, with terrifying scenarios. 

6 CHAPTERS OF CONTENT

6 Chapter of content, with DLC coming after release.

A SMALL BUFF AT THE PINK CAR

Before you start every level near a pink car with a gun next to it.
